org.takes.rq

Interface RqMethod

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Request
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RqMethod.Base

    public interface RqMethod
extends Request
    HTTP method parsing.

    All implementations of this interface must be immutable and thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.13.7
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@teamed.io)
